amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 117-225 to replace the base text of the bill with a fully paid-for expansion of GI Bill benefits to members of the Guard and Reserve who are on Federal Active Duty orders for missions other than training.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to replace the base text of the bill with a fully paid-for expansion of GI Bill benefits to members of the Guard and Reserve who are on Federal Active Duty orders for missions other than training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 4).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Moore (AL).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 4).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 4).
